title: New York to Allow Mobile Sports Betting as Soon as Saturday
sub_head: FanDuel, DraftKings among four mobile sports gambling operators that have met stateâ€™s requirements to take, process bets
body:
Mobile sports betting is coming to New York as early as this weekend.
The New York State Gaming Commission said Thursday that four mobile sports gambling operators can launch as soon as Saturday and that they have met requirements to take and process bets.
